constants.name: equilibrium_gs_deviation
constants.header: List of boundary condition types for 1D transport solvers

int.name: absolute_gs_difference
int.description: Average absolute difference of the Grad-Shafranov equation, <|Del* psi - j_tor*R|>, averaged over the plasma poloidal cross-section

int.name: root_mean_square_gs_difference
int.description: Root mean square difference of the Grad-Shafranov equation, sqrt(<(Del* psi - j_tor*R)^2 >), averaged over the plasma poloidal cross-section

int.name: max_absolute_psi_residual
int.description: Maximum absolute difference over the plasma poloidal cross-section of the poloidal flux between the current and preceding iteration, on fixed grid points

int.name: max_absolute_gs_difference_norm
int.description: Maximum absolute difference of the Grad-Shafranov equation, normalised, max(|Del* psi - j_tor*R|) / max(|Del* psi|), over the plasma poloidal cross-section

int.name: max_root_mean_square_gs_difference_norm
int.description: Root maximum square difference of the Grad-Shafranov equation, normalised, sqrt(max((Del* psi - j_tor*R)^2) / max((Del* psi)^2)), over the plasma poloidal cross-section
